Name: Alignment API
Description:
#Alignment API

The Alignment API allows other components or products to use the Alignment functionality and access specific classes and file formats.
## Alignment

The **alignment problem** concerns aligning two native documents (e.g. two Microsoft Word documents) where one native document is a translation of another native document to produce an aligned resource like an aligned TMX file or an aligned sdlxliff file.
##How to use

In order to start use the SpellChecking API you will have to reference in your project the following assemblies:

Sdl.Core.Processing.Alignment.Api.dll

Sdl.Core.Processing.Alignment.dll

#SpellChecking API

The SpellChecking API allows other components or products to implement there custom spell checking mechanism.
##How to use

In order to start use the SpellChecking API you will have to reference in your project the following assembly:

Sdl.SpellChecking.Api.dll
